text: It's Time for Love was the fifth album by Teddy Pendergrass, an R&B; crooner. It did quite well, peaking at #19 on the Billboard albums chart and #6 on the R&B; album charts. It also spawned three singles: "I Can't Live Without Your Love" (1981, peaked at #10 R&B;), "You're My Latest, My Greatest Inspiration" (1982, #43 US, #4 R&B;) and "Nine Times Out of Ten/The Gift of Love" (1982, #31 R&B;).
